name: Pink negroni
description: Celebrate Valentine's Day on 14 February with a pink negroni, a brilliant blush-hued cocktail made with pink gin, Aperol and sweet white vermouth
keywords: Aperol, Cocktails, negroni, pink gin, sweet white vermouth
recipeIngredients: 1 grapefruit or lemon wedge, and 1 basil leaf, to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the gin, vermouth and Aperol in a tumbler along with a small handful of ice. Stir until the outside of the glass feels cold.
Garnish with a grapefruit or lemon wedge, and a basil leaf, if you like.
